import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import './login.css' import React from 'react' import { baseUrl } from '../../api/api' import axios from 'axios' function Login() { const signupSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const response = await fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/register', { method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify({ 'username':e.target.username.value, 'email':e.target.email.value, 'password':e.target.password.value }) }) } const history = useNavigate() return (

Login Here

signupSubmit(e)} >

Don't yet registered? history('/register')} >SignUp here

) } export default Login
